name: Greater Ghast of Leng
description: The Greater Ghast of Leng is a large, twisted aberration with sharp claws and a ghastly appearance that embodies chaotic evil.
memorable: Notable for its ability to command other ghasts and lethal attacks against weakened foes.
goals: Seeks to hunt and devour the living, often targeting the injured or weak.
relations: Commands other ghasts of Leng, which may serve it in battle.
environment: Often found in dark, forgotten places, lurking in shadows or ruins.
strengths: Excels in melee combat with enhanced Dexterity and Strength; has advantage on attacks against weakened foes.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and significantly weakened in sunlight, suffering from attack penalties.
attacks: Employs a multiattack with deadly bite and claw strikes, capable of grappling and restraining smaller opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy grants it an advantage against injured foes, enhancing its lethality.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting it advantage on perception checks that rely on smell.
additional_information: Blood Frenzy provides advantage on attack rolls against injured creatures.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity causes significant damage and disadvantages in sunlight.
Can command allies to attack, increasing its threat in combat.
Grapples and restrains targets with successful claw hits, reducing their mobility.
High Dexterity enhances its avoidance and attack success.
test_queries: large deadly predator with ghastly features
monster that commands other ghasts in battle
menacing creature vulnerable to radiant damage
chaotic evil ghast that thrives in darkness
ferocious melee brawler with grappling ability
